comments.body: This patch ( https://github.com/yaml/libyaml/pull/10 ) let's us build DLLs and LIBs. It was the simplest thing I could come up with. Though improvements are certainly welcome.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +12,16 @@    # Change CMakeLists so that we can build static and shared libraries.
    # See this PR ( https://github.com/yaml/libyaml/pull/10 ) for details.
    - CMakeLists.txt.patch

build:
